content: This Yaoguai Chief is a lot more intimidating than the Bullguard, but thankfully much more approachable than the Wandering Wight nearby, even with his fearsome looking fiery twinblade. Remember that you can purchase some Cooling Powder should you find yourself being lit on fire too much, as well as Evil Repelling Medicant to boost your damage absorption.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Guangzhi.md', within the main section titled 'Guangzhi', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find Guangzhi' and the sub-subsection 'Guangzhi Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
This Yaoguai Chief is a lot more intimidating than the Bullguard, but thankfully much more approachable than the Wandering Wight nearby, even with his fearsome looking fiery twinblade. Remember that you can purchase some Cooling Powder should you find yourself being lit on fire too much, as well as Evil Repelling Medicant to boost your damage absorption.
